text: Yeva Ivanova also written as Jeva Ivanova (Russian: Ева Иванова, born 1937) is a former Soviet long track speed skater, who was active in the 1960s. Ivanova represented her nation at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women in 1962, finishing Xth overall. She also competed at other international competitions. Between 1960 and 1967 she competed eight times at the Soviet Allround Championships, with the best result in 1961, 1965 and 1966 finishing fourth overall. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Soviet female speed skaters Category:Living people
title: Yeva Ivanova
